Description: Reference Power to be Measured at (0: From BUS of POI. 1: To BUS of POI)
Remote frequency measurement bus number (0: Local)
Remote voltage measurement bus number (0: Local)
RPCM - Q Mode (1: Voltage. 2: PF. 3: Remote Q. 4: Local Q. 5: V-Stack)
PRCF - P Mpde (1: Local P. 2: Remote P. 3: Power Firm. 4: Local+Joint)
VSL - 1: Enable voltage reactive power stackable logic
FSL - 1: Enable frequency active power stackable logic
RRL - 1: Enable external reactive power controller command: 0: Disable
PRJPRIOR - 0: Internal project priority: 1: External project priority
EXTRNPRJBUS - External project machine bus (0: No external project)
EXTRNPRJID - External project machine ID (0: No external project)
EXTRNLRPJTP- External project type (0: Disabled. 1: PE. 2: SMA)
SISL - 1: Enable Synthetic inertia power stackable logic
DM - Discontinuous Mode for SI Enable = 1. Disable =0
LFDD - Low Frequency Demand Disconnection Enable = 1. Disable =0
Gen. VAR Number for the P command 9999 : Internal WPCMD / XADIFD
Gen. VAR Number for the Q command 9999 : Internal WQCMND / EFD
Gen. VAR Number for the V command 9999 : Internal VREF
Gen. VAR Number for the F command
Remote voltage measurement bus number for FRT (0: ICON(M+4) is used)
